item.title: Contact SKV School - Sri Kalyanathissa Vidyalaya
item.description: Contact Sri Kalyanathissa Vidyalaya, Batapola. Get in touch with our school administration, admissions office, or send us your inquiries. We're here to help.

item.title: Sri Kalyanathissa College | Batapola, Sri Lanka
item.description: Discover Sri Kalyanathissa College in Batapola, Galle — a leading school in Sri Lanka for Grades 1–11 with academic and cultural excellence.

item.title: About SKV School - Sri Kalyanathissa Vidyalaya
item.description: Learn about Sri Kalyanathissa Vidyalaya, established in 1974 in Batapola, Galle District. Discover our mission, vision, values and rich educational heritage serving over 1,385 students.
